channel.title: Comments on: What Would You Ask Bill Gates?

item.title: By: P.H.Pennings
item.dc:creator: P.H.Pennings
item.description: I´am 72 years old and cannot so good writing in your leangue.but I try. If it is possible i want ask Bill Gates of it is possible that he send me a computer, so i can tray to used it. I have no money to buy it. Thank you. our senserley Pete.
item.content:encoded:
I´am 72 years old and cannot so good writing in your leangue.but I try.
If it is possible i want ask Bill Gates of it is possible that he send me a computer, so i can tray to used it.
I have no money to buy it.
Thank you.
our senserley Pete.

item.title: By: Linda Miller
item.dc:creator: Linda Miller
item.description: Dear Mr. Gates; Have you ever considered trying to set up a large organization that would save/help all the homeless people(many being veterans of USA)? Since you have so much power and a large money volume, you could set up areas across the USA, to bring in the homeless, have them receive medical and dental exams, clean them up, dress them up, have them go through a spiritual uplifting and a mental uplifting to gradually help them with a transittion back into society. Please consider this project, which is desperately needed at this time in the USA. With open hearts and open minds, you and your teams of assistants, can make such a big change in our current suffering world! God BLess and keep up all the wonderful projects ! Sincerely, Linda Miller
item.content:encoded:
Dear Mr. Gates;
Have you ever considered trying to set up a large organization that would save/help all the homeless people(many being veterans of USA)?
Since you have so much power and a large money volume, you could set up areas across the USA, to bring in the homeless, have them receive medical and dental exams, clean them up, dress them up, have them go through a
spiritual uplifting and a mental uplifting to gradually help them with a transittion back into society.
Please consider this project, which is desperately needed at this time in the USA.
With open hearts and open minds, you and your teams of assistants, can make such a big change in our current suffering world!
God BLess and keep up all the wonderful projects !
Sincerely,
Linda Miller

item.title: By: Sharad Bhusal
item.dc:creator: Sharad Bhusal
item.description:
Respected Sir,
Question- Why do you invest just in America, Not to any developing countries like Nepal in IT sectors? Is it true that you feel the lack of inteliigence in manpower of developing countires? Please try to invest in developing countries like Nepal for the Growth of IT in World?
Best regards Sharad Bhusal Kathmandu, Nepal contact 0977-9841461390 (Mobile)
item.content:encoded:
Respected Sir,

Question-
Why do you invest just in America, Not to any developing countries like Nepal in IT sectors? Is it true that you feel the lack of inteliigence in manpower of developing countires? Please try to invest in developing countries like Nepal for the Growth of IT in World?

Best regards
Sharad Bhusal
Kathmandu, Nepal
contact 0977-9841461390 (Mobile)
